a1: Yes soccer is my biggest passion
q2: What is your most memorable football game?
a2: Well i think the 2018 world cup finale was great.
q3: Do you have a favourite victory by an underdog?
a3: Yes Croatia beating Germany in the 1998 world cup.
a4: I think Croatia making the finals in 2018 is good too.
q5: Yes, I think it's the best
a5: I hope Croatia can keep the momentum going. They do have a pretty old squad right now.
